backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of all main frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global OKLCH color variables and theme modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry configuring TanStack Router routes and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with about text, quick links, social icons, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding, auth actions, theme toggle, and responsive menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hook managing Internet Identity authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks providing placeholder backend data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the React app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays the user's dashboard with mock metrics, weak areas, daily plan, and recent activity using various UI cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature list, and Internet Identity login redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/MockTests.tsx: Shows mock test listings, filters by company, and displays recent attempts with performance stats.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Two-step onboarding form collecting user details and target companies, then navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile settings page allowing users to edit personal and preference data with a summary card and form controls.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Renders the Progress Analytics page with summary cards and multiple charts visualizing study time, category distribution, readiness history, and topic confidence.
frontend/src/pages/StudyLog.tsx: Implements the Study Log page with a form to record study sessions and a tabbed view showing recent session history.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current state, including goals, architecture notes, and pending feature requests for the Placement Prep Tracker.
